mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT (P_NO, B_NO, P_NAME_KO, P_NAME_EN, P_MODEL_NO, P_RELEASE_PRICE, P_CATEGORY, P_CLASS, P_STOCK, R_CHECK, R_PRICE) VALUES(rproduct_no_seq.nextval, #{b_no}, #{p_name_ko}, #{p_name_en}, #{p_model_no}, #{p_release_price}, #{p_category}, 'rental', #{p_stock}, 'y', #{r_price})
